RitualOutcomeEffectDef.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will receive between 2 and 12 research points per participant, divided between the available research projects at the moment. Animal technology level projects will be prioritized.\n\nAdditionally, positive results have a chance for a wild man or farm animals to be attracted to the colony.

li.label: Ineffective
li.description: The {0} was ineffective! We tried to discuss some new developments in the tribe, but it devolved into petty bickering about food and shelter...\n\n2 points of research per participant will be distributed among the available research projects.

li.label: Uninspiring
li.description: The {0} was uninspiring. There were some new ideas floating around, but not much of substance. At least it was kinda entertaining.\n\n4 points of research per participant will be distributed among the available research projects.

li.label: Encouraging
li.description: The {0} was encouraging. Some of the ideas discussed were pretty great! We are probably unto something here.\n\n8 points of research per participant will be distributed among the available research projects.

li.label: Inspiring
li.description: The {0} was inspiring! The tribe is close to a breakthrough!\n\n12 points of research per participant will be distributed among the available research projects.
